trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Escondido
There was one other sighting in Escondido on or around April 11th 2002
divs: sighting detailsafter just viewing 3 other objects that hovered (and i forgot to mention theyhad gained altitude in my last report) in the sky around 12:45 today, i turnedto look out my window and saw a single object moving very fast from west toeast. the object was oblong and very shiny silver\white. no structuralfeatures could be seen. as it traveled it seemed to wobble and change shape(almost a tumbling motion. there were no appendages on the craft, it wassmooth. this sighting was almost the same area of the sky that the other 3objects were seen, just a little lower in the horizon and closer.
Summary: An oblong shiny wobbling object seen moving fast
